modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod adds recipes from blocks that have not got recipes. Player Vending Machine, Tool Table, Fishing Tank, Weight Bench and more.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod adds recipes from blocks that have not got recipes.

More will be added in time.

Here are some of the additions:

* Player Vending Machine
* Pool Table
* Fish Tank
* Weight Bench
* Concrete Barriers (3 versions)
* Flamethrower trap

to name a few.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/stallionsden/stallionsmodlets/tree/main/Stallionsdens%20Extra%20Recipes)**

If you appreciate Stallionsdenâ€™s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](http://paypal.me/AnthonyCar78).

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19911-stallionsdens-and-valmars-a19-mod-thread/).
